item.description: Best Friends Pet Care is hosting a FREE meet-up for dog lovers! We will be having a pool party to beat the heat. The pool is a dog bone shaped pool set up in our specially designed doggy play area for them to splash in. If you are lookig for a fun way to socialize your friendly pooch and meet other dog owners, then stop by for an afternoon of fun. We provide water, toys, and clean up.  Please be sure your pet is up to date on vaccines because they will be playing off-leash with other dogs. We look forward to meeting you and having some summer fun!
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Splash-A-Palooza!
